pages.text: The $(item)Grilled Heart Aspect$() is the perfect aspect for the perpetually hungry. When broken, it will quite violently stuff a piece of finely grilled meat into your mouth. As you are probably aware, this will also saturate and thereby heal you by a few hearts unless you're $(o)really$() hungry.
$(o)$(#999999)steaks are so tastypilled. i was hungrycore before but now im satiated gang fr fr$()
